name: Line 98
description:
Make straight lines of balls to score! Play Free!

The goal is simple: Make straight lines of 5 or more same-colored balls. Each line you make will be cleared from the board, but be careful: For each move where you don't make a line, random balls will appear!

A full board means game over, so don't get stuck!


= WHY YOU’LL LOVE COLOR LINES =

• FREE to play!

• CREATE lines of matching-balls and master the art of making longer lines!

• CHOOSE between 3 game modes: Lines, Squares, Blocks

• SMART, fun, and thoughtful design

• ENJOY beautiful minimalistic design and relaxing game music

• PLAY at your own pace to make the perfect move without having to worry about a clock

• CHALLENGE your friends and see how you match up!

Start connecting on your iPhone and iPad today!

PLEASE NOTE! Color Lines is completely free to play, but you can also disable ads with real money. You can find it in the settings menu.
